products.title: Zucchini & Broccoli
products.description: This nutrient-dense blend features ingredients that are gentle and beneficial for babies. Butternut squash is loaded with vitamin A, supporting healthy vision and immune function, while apples provide fiber, promoting good digestion. A touch of cinnamon adds a mild, baby-friendly spice that can help boost metabolism and aid digestion.

products.title: Butternut Squash, Apple & Cinnamon
products.description: This nutrient-dense blend features ingredients that are gentle and beneficial for babies. Butternut squash is loaded with vitamin A, supporting healthy vision and immune function, while apples provide fiber, promoting good digestion. A touch of cinnamon adds a mild, baby-friendly spice that can help boost metabolism and aid digestion.

products.title: Chickpea & Banana
products.description: This creamy blend combines protein-rich chickpeas and potassium-packed bananas. Chickpeas provide essential plant-based protein and fibre, supporting healthy digestion and muscle development in babies. Bananas offer potassium, which is important for heart health, and natural carbohydrates to fuel active little ones.

products.title: Zucchini & Broccoli
products.description: Packed with vitamins, this blend includes broccoli and zucchini for a savory taste, complemented by the sweetness of apples.

products.title: Butternut Squash, Apple & Cinnamon
products.description: This formula features a mix of plums, bananas, and carrots, providing essential nutrients for growing babies.

products.title: Chickpea & Banana
products.description: A delicious combination of pears, blueberries, and apples, offering antioxidants and vitamins in every spoonful.
